title: THORTL - a new heavy blackletter
content:
Hi mates..!!!

This is my first entry on 'Typophile' I'm here for just show and share an opinion of fontdesign and all kind like this about.

**"THORTL - a new heavy blackletter"**  
born and was inpired of my love to "Medieval concepts". When I designed this font I'm not complicated so much to myself about its shapes cuz I concentrated on a simple construction and keep two constant ideas on mind: one, that must be the readable and two, must keep the main concept. this is all.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thortl-webshow_typophile_4334.png)

Now on 2nd place you find a "farola" update, new sheet where show "farola simple"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Farola-simple_SHOW_3616.png)

Now I done a new font for write technical things, over machines, mechas or so.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SP-font_SHOW_UP_3783.jpg)

and other work in progress, a font designed for very smallest prints done according a optical test.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/minesmall-SHOW_UP_4836.jpg)

New Update from "LEGAN" fontface

May 17, 2009: New Update for: "Política" Uppercases.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Politica_2nd-WIP-show_6165.jpg)

please check the attachment files for watch details.

C&C are very welcomed.  
=)  
Regards

Pedro [PeGGO]
